channel.title: ios on Journey through engineering…
channel.description: Recent content in ios on Journey through engineering…

item.title: Small Tip for Debugging Autolayout issues
item.description: This is quite a small post and probably not worth writing it but I know that this will come in handy in the future and will totally forget about it. The other day I was trying to figure out an Autolayout crash on the app I was working on and trying to make head of tails from the console log with stuff like this: <NSAutoresizingMaskLayoutConstraint:0x175086220 h=-&- v=-&- UIView:0x147533250.height == UIView:0x14760b4a0.height> Imagine that but with many interacting UIViews at play; most of the time you can actually figure what’s going on based on the constant value or if you are well versed you can see the Matrix from source code a la Neo; but let’s be honest; more times than none you are left wondering which view is which…

item.title: 'Show' Adaptative Segue Error
item.description: On our projects we use multiple UIStoryboard files to break our apps; yes, we use storyboards, we are drinking Apple’s “Kool-Aid” and personally they are real time savers and let us focus on improving the experience and enforcing the business rules. Fist Glimpse Of The Problem Although this “embracing the change” would come to hunts us with a weird bug that was reported to us; hitting a “share” button was yielding no actions…
